StationType.name: Huari temple
StationType.attributes: enemy, envWater, envAvoidsEarth, generic, huari, huariTemple, human, majorStation, populated

Default.OnPaneInit: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You find Apotamo's broken body among the ruins of the temple. He struggles to whisper in your ear:\n\n" "\"I was wrong. Only darkness awaits.\"" ))

Language.Text: The Huari temple is dark and cavernous. Huari men and women dressed in long, colorful clothing swarm around you as you enter. They are curious but shy.
"\"Welcome, pilgrim! All who are peaceful shall be offered peace in return.\""

StationType.name: Huari fortress(es)
StationType.attributes: enemy, envWater, envAvoidsEarth, generic, huari, human, majorStation, populated

Language.Text: The Huari fortress is dark and cavernous. Huari men and women dressed in long, colorful clothing swarm around you as you enter. They are curious but shy.
The Grand Hall is abuzz with activity; %governor% is too busy to see you.
"Welcome back, %name%! Take your ease here before you continue your long journey."
You enter the Grand Hall but the governors ignore your presence. You feel out of place here.

%governor% weeps alone in the Grand Hall.
"All hope is lost now that our refuge has been destroyed. The Light has forsaken us and we are left with nothing."

Inside the Grand Hall you meet the governors of the fortress. A short, balding man with a ceremonial scepter greets you.
"By all the mysteries of the Light! You come from a distant system to help us. So was it revealed. My name is %governor%, and I govern this fortress. If you have come to help us, then you are most welcome."

%governor% is waiting for you:
"Welcome back, friend. By all the glory of the Light, I can see you are confident and powerful. Will you use your powers to help us? If so, you are truly a shining messenger."
"The blessings of the Light are not always visible, but there is a streak of darkness within you that cannot be ignored. You are not our defender; you are just a fool who seeks but doesn't learn."
